Blinker:15x15 15x16 15x17
Glider:2x2 3x3 3x4 2x4 1x4
Toad:2x2 2x3 3x2 5x4 5x5 4x5
Pulsar:3x5 3x6 3x7 3x11 3x12 3x13 5x3 5x8 5x10 5x15 6x3 6x8 6x10 6x15 7x3 7x8 7x10 7x15 8x5 8x6 8x7 8x11 8x12 8x13 10x5 10x6 10x7 10x11 10x12 10x13 11x3 11x8 11x10 11x15 12x3 12x8 12x10 12x15 13x3 13x8 13x10 13x15 15x5 15x6 15x7 15x11 15x12 15x13
Mirrored (Custom):10x5 10x6 10x7 10x11 10x12 10x13 11x3 11x8 11x10 11x15 12x3 12x8 12x10 12x15 13x3 13x8 13x10 13x15 15x5 15x6 15x7 15x11 15x12 15x13
